title: Two-Factor Authentication
Create Strong Passwords
context: Enable 2FA on all your important accounts. Use authenticator apps like Google Authenticator or Authy instead of SMS. This ensures that even if someone gets your password, they still need access to your second factor to log in.

Never reuse passwords across different accounts. Use a unique, complex password for each service combining uppercase, lowercase, numbers, and special characters. Consider using a password manager to generate and store them securely.

content_item.context: Never reuse passwords across different accounts...
